URGENT Solar Directory
How about a free listing in the American Solar Energy Society's directory? Yes it is true. It really is free, but you have to have your information to me by Tuesday the 27th.
This is what is required if you want to be included.
Business name Mailing address including zip code Public phone number
Here’s is a look at last year’s online Solar Installer directory: http://www.solartoday-digital.org/solartoday/200910#pg48
Below are the stats on target audience, distribution numbers….
Print run for Solar Today’s Get Started issue last year was 120,000. Most of those are distributed to visitors to the National Solar Tour, Oct. 2. About 20,000 are mailed out to subscribers on Sept. 15. Target audiences are ASES members and homeowners visiting the National Solar Tour because they’re interested in buying home energy upgrades.

Long Term Growth
The U.S. should be looked at as a long-term growth market said Shayle Kann, a senior analyst at GTM Research, during a talk at Intersolar North America in San Francisco, the U.S. on Thursday. "It’s not a place where you can come and develop projects and make a killing quickly,” he stated. You can read the entire article here. http://www.pv-magazine.com/news/details/beitrag/us-must-be-looked-at-as-a-long-term-growth-market_100000536/ Are you a brochure puppy? "Great information, you have been extremely helpful! Can you leave me a brochure so we can think about it?"
Are you a brochure puppy? Do you run and get a brochure and then think all the way home.....Oh yea, they will be calling me.
